Reviews.Title: Excellent product!
Reviews.Author: Sílvio Joaquim de Santana
Reviews.Content: Realy good tablet for the price, nice retina screen, full and quick response at a soft finger touch, light, slim like an Ipad.Just one thing i'm not satisfied: the CPU frequency is 1.0 giga hertz and was wrongly announced 1.5 gigahertz, i think. But it doesn't matter (for me).

ProductInfo.Features:
CPU:	Allwinner A31, Cortex A7 quad core, 1.5GHz; GPU: PowerVR SGX544 MP2
Operation System:	Android 4.1.1  ( Jelly Bean )
RAM:	2GB (DDR 3) ROM:（Memory）	16GB Nand Flash
Screen Size: 9.7 Inch; Screen Type: Retina Screen, IPS; Screen Resolution: 2048 x 1536px
1 x MINI HDMI port
ProductInfo.Name: Panda Pad Novo9 Spark Quad Core A31 Tablet PC 9.7 Inch Android 4.1 (Jelly Bean) Retina IPS Screen 2G RAM 16G ROM 4K Video HDMI White Dual Camera 2048 x 1536px Super Slim Altra Thin Debut
